home.title: Yamada UI - A UI component library unleashing the power of styling, animation, and flexibility in React applications.
home.description: A UI component library unleashing the power of styling, animation, and flexibility in React applications.

heading: `Unleash the Power` of
Styling, Animation, and Flexibility
in React Apps
hero.message: Yamada UI is a versatile React component library, unleashing the power of your application's animation and flexibility. It provides an intuitive and efficient way to integrate advanced styling into your application, bringing your ideas to life.

support.title: Support Yamada UI
support.description: Our maintainers dedicate their time, effort, and heart to ensure Yamada UI continues to improve. Please support us by donating to our team.
